author: CTPPS
body: Upload LHC optics file for 2018 and RunIII for HECTOR proton propagator (beamline simulator). They are needed to test nominal optics or PPS simulation with non-realistic optics. The files were tested for validity purpose only, they don't cause any trouble for the cmssw code.
title: Adding 2018 and Run3 optics to Hector configuration
